text:
TIRUNELVELI

District Science Centre: Techno fair, M. Karunakaran, Collector, presides, K. Baskar, Vice-Chancellor, Manonmaniam Sundaranar University, inaugurates, DSC auditorium, 9.30 a.m.

Einstein College of Engineering: Department of Management Studies, management meet for students of arts and science colleges, R. Ravi, Department of Management Studies, Manonmaniam Sundaranar University, chief guest, 9.30 a.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous and Al-Anon: Meeting, Little Flower Matriculation Higher Secondary School, Tirunelveli Town, 7 p.m.

AMBASAMUDRAM

Rotary Club of Ambasamudram: Meeting, Rotary Community Hall, Urkad, 6.45 p.m.

KOVILPATTI

National Engineering College: Department of Mechanical Engineering, national-level workshop and technical symposium, ARCUEZ’16, R. Neelakandan, General Manager (Operations), Toyota Logistics, Bengaluru, chief guest, delivers inaugural address, K.R. Arunachalam, member, managing committee, presides, college auditorium, 9.30 a.m.
title: engagements
